ok, i had deleted this, but i have re created an iso, and downloaded the torrent and it appears to be checking it as I type, so hopefully it will work and help you guys that have been stuck, plz let me know if this works ok, i created the original iso with magiciso, and have recreated it with Nero this time so fingers crossed.
ok, it finsihed checking, got to 100 percent, but instead of seeding it started to download again, i will try again with magiciso, if that fails i will create a fresh torrent.
